availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Lynch (Louisville, Kentucky, foundryman and carpenter)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, foundryman and carpenter. Ireland native. Married to Margaret Lynch. Father of Eliza Lynch, Mary Lynch, Joanna Lynch, Samuel Lynch, Michael Lynch, and John Lynch. Foundryman in Louisville in 1850. Carpenter in Louisville in 1860 and 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 2, p. 227A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 1, p. 21.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 1, p. 138.
